meanings.definition: The act or process of consecuting.
meanings.sent1: The consecutions of the ceremony were carried out with precision.
meanings.sent2: The consecutions of the project were completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The consecutions of the game were so well organized, it felt like a dance routine.
meanings.sent4: The consecutions of life's milestones are like connecting dots on a grand canvas.
meanings.sent5: The consecutions of the story were so clear that even a child could follow along.

meanings.definition: A series or sequence of events or actions.
meanings.sent1: The consecutions of events led to a surprising outcome.
meanings.sent2: The consecutions of actions determined the final result.
meanings.sent3: The consecutions of mishaps in the comedy of errors made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The consecutions of decisions in the drama unfolded like a well-written script.
meanings.sent5: The consecutions of adventures in the book kept readers hooked till the end.
